attributes.action: Over 65 & disabled to receive a national cap on emergency Callout works
attributes.additional_details:
I would like a national cap that would stop companies and individuals from charging between £165 and £185 per hour, plus parts and vat on top.
The companies and individuals need to be stopped from also being allowed to demand payment up front with a credit or debit card.
This traps the customer, even if work is not completed they get charged.
We would like to see a fair and standard rate withing all the Plumbing, Heating and Electrical industries.

A fair rate for a Good job, not robbery
attributes.background:
The over 65 and disabled members of our country suffer in silence.
They are subject to either rogue traders or massive costs for emergency Plumbing, Heating & Electrical
They can barley afford the cost of living, there needs to be a cap in what can be charged to them, 24 hours a day

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about prices for services provided by tradespeople are a matter for individual tradespersons, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling for changes to financial support available to over 65s and disabled people, if that's something you'd like to happen.
